message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $15000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $12000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I was really hoping to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $13000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. However, I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll offer it to you for $14000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but $14000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $13200. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that we're getting close, Bob. However, I'm not willing to give up on the extra $200. I'll meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $13400. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but $13400 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above $13200. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already met you halfway twice and I'm not willing to go any further. I'll offer it to you for $13250, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you're trying to get the best price, Alice, but I'm not willing to go above $13000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other options.
